articles.description: Leicester Tigers 56-26 Bristol Bears - how we rated the Tigers players from Mattioli Woods Welford Road win
articles.content:
A record-breaking Chris Ashton hat-trick helped Tigers secure a Premiership home-semi final.
Tigers were ruthless as they demolished Bristol Bears 56-26 scoring eight tries in the process. Ashton co… [+5137 chars]
